title: What are Indian  ancient philosophy? Who are famous ancient Indian philosopher? Which philosophy had bring huge impact on Indian civilisation? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A Indian having thousands years old civilizations have several philosophical views that can be termed as “ancient”. They are: Samkhya SystemYogaNyayaVaisheshikaMimansaVedantaOfcourse Jainism and Buddhism For details please refer:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indian_philosophyhttp://www.nios.ac.in/media/documents/SecICHCour/English/CH.08.pdfhttp://www.iep.utm.edu/hindu-ph/ For famous Indian philosophers, below answer on quora might help. My personal favourite is Sri Adi Shankara.Who are some great ancient Indian philosophers whom Indians don't know, but they should? As far as their impact is concerned, they all have their impact in different periods. Usually at one location or period, one of them is prevelant however that too is not entire true to say. India is a complex nation and today what we see is an amalgamation of all this ( plus few modern thoughts) that went through some social reforms.

certainly it was Buddha,that's why he called as "light of Asia" still he was a great philosopher,also his philosophy and teachings will be the key to save the world from war and battles. He never declared him as God like Krishna said or say messenger of god like Jesus and Mohammed did.he himself declared as an ordinary man who found a way to remove sorrows of  mankind and to restore peace.
